body:
<!-- Thanks for filing an issue! Before hitting the button, please answer these questions.-->

**Is this a request for help?** (If yes, you should use our troubleshooting guide and community support channels, see http://kubernetes.io/docs/troubleshooting/.): No


**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.): taint, selector

---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one): BUG REPORT

<!--
If this is a BUG REPORT, please:
  - Fill in as much of the template below as you can.  If you leave out
    information, we can't help you as well.

If this is a FEATURE REQUEST, please:
  - Describe *in detail* the feature/behavior/change you'd like to see.

In both cases, be ready for followup questions, and please respond in a timely
manner.  If we can't reproduce a bug or think a feature already exists, we
might close your issue.  If we're wrong, PLEASE feel free to reopen it and
explain why.
-->

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.0", GitCommit:"fff5156092b56e6bd60fff75aad4dc9de6b6ef37", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-03-28T16:36:33Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.1", GitCommit:"b0b7a323cc5a4a2019b2e9520c21c7830b7f708e", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-04-03T20:33:27Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

**Environment**:
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: GKE
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release): MacOS client, linux server
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`):
- **Install tools**:gcloud
- **Others**:


**What happened**:
I tried to kubectl taint some nodes using a label selector:
kubectl taint nodes -l dedicated=foo dedicated=foo:PreferNoSchedule

and got the error:
error: at least one resource name must be specified since 'all' parameter is not set

**What you expected to happen**:
Those nodes would be tainted with dedicated=foo:PreferNoSchedule.  Trying to use --all along with the selector is also not supported.

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
kubectl taint nodes -l <any label selector> dedicated=foo:PreferNoSchedule


**Anything else we need to know**:
title: Label selector not supported in kubectl taint
